inputs.name: standalone_client_id
inputs.title: Standalone Client ID
inputs.description: Client ID provided during registration of Inferno as a standalone application

inputs.name: standalone_client_secret
inputs.title: Standalone Client Secret
inputs.description: Client Secret provided during registration of Inferno as a standalone application

inputs.name: patient_ids
inputs.title: Patient IDs
inputs.description: Comma separated list of patient IDs that in sum contain all MUST SUPPORT elements

inputs.name: implantable_device_codes
inputs.title: Implantable Device Type Code
inputs.description: Enter the code for an Implantable Device type, or multiple codes separated by commas. If blank, Inferno will validate all Device resources against the Implantable Device profile

inputs.name: tnm_distant_metastases_category_code
inputs.title: Code of TNM Distant Metastases Category

inputs.name: tnm_primary_tumor_category_code
inputs.title: Code of TNM Primary Tumor Category

inputs.name: tnm_regional_nodes_category_code
inputs.title: Code of TNM Regional Nodes Category

inputs.name: medication_administration_effective_date
inputs.title: Effective Date Time of Medication Administration
